column2: y its judgment delivered on 25th June 1999, the District Court:

column3: upheld  the  position  of  the  2nd  Defendant  that  the  beneficial  interest  in  the  said
property had not been transferred to Kureishan, and that the said property is being
held in trust for the 2nd Defendant by Kureishan, as well as by the 1st Defendant and
directed the Plaintiff to transfer the said property to the 2nd Defendant upon the
payment of a sum of Rs. 110,000.
